mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (sender_id, receiver_id, msg_content, msg_sent_at, msg_read, sender_msg_status, receiver_msg_status) VALUES (#{sender_id}, #{receiver_id}, #{msg_content}, #{msg_sent_at}, #{msg_read},"N","N")
mapper.select: SELECT msg_idx,sender_id,receiver_id,msg_content,msg_sent_at FROM message WHERE sender_id = #{sender_id} AND sender_msg_status = "N" ORDER BY msg_sent_at DESC
SELECT msg_idx,sender_id,receiver_id,msg_content,msg_sent_at FROM message WHERE receiver_id = #{receiver_id} AND sender_msg_status = "N" ORDER BY msg_sent_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET receiver_msg_status="D" WHERE msg_idx = #{msg_idx}
UPDATE message SET sender_msg_status="D" WHERE msg_idx = #{msg_idx}
UPDATE message SET receiver_msg_status="S" WHERE msg_idx = #{msg_idx}
UPDATE message SET sender_msg_status="S" WHERE msg_idx = #{msg_idx}
